meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>request</kanji> <kanji>marriage</kanji> with someone else, you are doing a <vocabulary>marriage proposal</vocabulary>. Will you marry me, Brad Pitt?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
